abstract.t: This document is work in progress and defines the R2 package for the Megaco/H.248 Protocol that can be used to exchange call setup supervisory and control information between a Media Gateway (MG) and a Media Gateway Controller (MGC) to realize Signaling System R2 at a VoIP Gateway. It is intended to satisfy the requirements in section 12 of the Megaco/H.248 protocol [2].
